ygData.subject: Enchanters Research components
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone discovered the secrets to the Enchanters research components.  Wizards have runes and necros have pages, but do enchanters have words?? If so, does
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone discovered the secrets to the Enchanters research components. Wizards have runes and necros have pages, but do enchanters have words??

If so, does anyone know of these words? Has anyone found these and where are they.

#2. How do languages work. I have elder erudian, erudin and common, nut how do you get started whith other languages. I talk to the foreegners, but I don't get the skill to show up on my skill list? Please help

Sinth the Enchanter
